review_title: My best work experience so far.
pros: Started as a part-time tutor, I shifted to full-time after graduation. People are really nice, the salary is higher than the market average and the office super-comfortable.
cons: From time to time I have too much on the plate and work overtime. It's paid off, though.
advice_to_mgmt: Guys, we run out of chocolate chip cookies too fast!

pros: I've worked at Nerdify for a year as a tutor. It's a very lovely place, people are very nice and the senior management really knows how to get the job done. Salary is good, but sometimes you have to work long hours.
cons: The job interview is hard. Heavy workload.

pros: I've been a freelance tutor for almost 2 years until one of my students told me about Nerdify. I decided to check it out and see what they could offer for an experienced tutor like myself. Turns out to be a great opportunity to get good payment for your work.
cons: There are a lot of requests and you need to work hard.

pros: Flexibility and so easy to work with .. great experience .. great company .. Happy to work for such a fine company .. can not think of any bad experiences
cons: None .. I truly can not think of anything negative .. Everything was good with no regrets .. Happy to have been there

review_title: best place to work in SF
pros: It was a pleasure to work for Nerdify: nice people, great product, comfortable work space and tons of food.
cons: Don't have so much to say.. Maybe our communication with management could've been better.

review_title: A really nice place to work
pros:
Very cool product, amazing team and inspiring mission. I was very satisfied with everything Nerdify had to offer:
- You work with really interesting people with completely different backgrounds.
- Company cares about your career path and personal development.
- There were always free drinks and snacks in the office.
- Top management is very open minded and they always listen to new ideas and suggestions.
cons: The job was a bit stressful. However, they did reward top performers, so it wasn't that bad.
advice_to_mgmt: Everything that Nerdify is doing is simply amazing and great. There is not much I can advice, except hiring more people to stay on top of the workload.

pros: awesome co-workers, lots of fun, free food, great perks.
cons: occasionally food can be dull

pros:
- Young and ambitious team that is always ready to help you out.
- Every employee has a clear scope of responsibilities and clearly defined KPIs
- Gym membership and pizza parties
cons: I have to work on weekends to meet all of the goals.
advice_to_mgmt: We need more people in the Marketing department.

review_title: The best company to work for
pros: I’m working on cutting edge projects with really smart people. There are tons of activities on campus, like gyms and cafes (the food is free). And I can talk to CEOs whenever I want, which is a cool thing. They’re brilliant, and care about their employees. I do admire how they lead the company
cons: There are going to be winners and losers when it comes to career growth, so smart people can become losers due to the high standards.
advice_to_mgmt: Don't forget that there is already a pool of incredibly smart and talented people within the company, then maybe you won't lose some of the great ones.

review_title: Educational startup is a job of my dream
pros:
It is extremely exciting and joyful to create such an innovative product. Team is friendly and open-minded, we share ideas and evaluate them all together. Management is aimed to inspire our creativity, I've never seen our founders in a bad mood - atmosphere in the office is awesome.
It's the first time I can sincerely say that my colleagues became my friends.
cons: Our website GoNerdify.com is about to launch, so there is a lot of work and lack of personal time. But it's a common practice when you're a part of the startup's team.
advice_to_mgmt: Stop ordering pizza to the office, otherwise your team will have weight problems :)

pros: I didn't work here for long because I was preparing to go back to university, but I loved working for them as a writer and researcher. Flexible, fun working environment and plenty of interesting tasks. Would highly recommend working with this awesome team if you get a chance to apply.
cons: I would of liked more hours and a full-time contract but unfortunately this wasn't available at the time.

pros: Convenient office location with a great window view. A decent work-life balance is achievable. Generous employee benefits package.
cons: Not a fan of the strict 24/7 communication availability policies. You may be woken up in the middle of the night if a student has a question or needs clarifications.

pros: The work life balance is excellent
cons: I don’t have any cons yet

pros: Career options, great perks, friendly environment
cons: I have a huge workload

pros:
Great salary and perks
Free trainings and seminars
cons: I had to pass a lot of tests to land this job. The interview process was quite challenging and stressful.
advice_to_mgmt: I don't live in SF and it takes me about 2 hours to get to work every morning. It would be nice if there was an option to work from home.

review_title: As good as a company can be
pros: It is an absolutely amazing company to grow and learn. People are very smart in here.
cons: It just has so many talented people so the space for you is very limited.

pros: work/life balance is great, awesome perks, amazing projects
cons: I can’t complain so far

pros: Great company to work for. A lot of perks
cons: Sometimes difficult to get recognition for work.

pros: Flexible schedule, progressive atmosphere, cosy location
cons: Subjective team leading (not always effective, but distracting)
advice_to_mgmt: Regarding the response time. According to my observation to make it 3 minutes and be effective at the same time it's quite impossible due to the dashboard tasks and the complicated orders. Usually, it takes time to learn the client's details. That's why I would suggest to allocate one guy per shift for such complicated orders. In this case, the rest of the team will meet the response time rule.

review_title: Everyone here learns something new everyday
pros: It is a great thing that we, at GoNerdify.com, are able to see the service grow and develop - usually when you start working somewhere everything is already established. Here, it is different - all the employees are equal, everyone listens to each other and support the newbies. The office is very comfortable, the team is provided with drinks and snacks, the service is cool - what more one could ask for? Nerdify is the best place to work for if you want to grow both professionally and personally, cause there is something new we learn every day.
cons: The only downside might be the fact that everyone here is a little bit obsessed with GoNerdify. Looking for best nerds, working hard on improving our service and making sure that our clients are happy - these are the three main goals of our everyday life. Time after time I fall asleep thinking about the orders I processed today and whether the client was completely satisfied.
advice_to_mgmt: Perhaps a change of scene every now and then would help us become even more creative in our everyday tasks, and will further improve our teamwork skills. Other than that - stay awesome!
